title: Protecting User Data
content: Recently researchers found a component in modern computers that might make it easier for hackers to make a side-channel attack.

title: Quantum Computing
content: A team of physicists have started demonstrating how an algorithm can help be implemented so that errors do not spoil results

title: Smelling in VR might become possible
content: An olfactometer might make it possible to smell in a vr enviroment.

title: Black holes
content: A black hole is burping up stellar remains.

title: Asteroid
content: DART mission changed an asteroids route.
